mapper.insert: insert into sitter_profile (member_id, profile_photo, profile_content, price_small, price_medium, price_large, profile_roadaddress, profile_jibunaddress, profile_detailaddress) values(#{id}, #{profilePicPath}, #{content}, #{small}, #{medium}, #{large}, #{roadAddress}, #{jibunAddress}, #{detailAddress})

insert into license (member_id, license_id, license_photo, license_name, license_agency, license_date) values(#{id}, seq_license.nextval, #{licensePicPath}, #{licenseName}, #{licenseAgency}, #{licenseDate})

insert into service (member_id, service_00, service_01, service_02, service_03, service_04, service_05, service_06, service_07) values(#{id}, #{petService[0]}, #{petService[1]}, #{petService[2]}, #{petService[3]}, #{petService[4]}, #{petService[5]}, #{petService[6]}, #{petService[7]})
insert into schedule (member_id, schedule_id, schedule_closed) values(#{id}, seq_schedule.nextval, #{closed})
